summary: Adds a small selection of random vanilla clothes to the Riverwood trader.
descriptionHtml:
It always bugged me that when you start a new game the only set of clothes you can get is a belted Tunic you get from Alvor or Gerdur respectively, and no shoes of any kind.  I always thought that the Riverwood trader should have something, but they don\'t.

This mod fixes that by giving a small selection of random clothes to the riverwood trader so that you aren\'t either stuck wearing the horrible belted tunic, prisoner rags or armor around town.

I made this for myself, but figured this may have bugged other people as well.

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_featured_500.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: Jimmybob
